explanation: [0-0] A girl wearing a yellow shirt stands in a brightly decorated room, holding a phone. She looks directly at the camera. The phone screen displays a blue-purple image with German text and a phone icon at the top. The background wall is covered with various colorful cards or papers and decorations such as dried flower bouquets and picture frames.
[0-5] The girl remains in the room, holding the phone. The images on the phone screen change as she swipes, showing different apps and pictures.
